Could we still make strong, provable guarantees for application-specific algorithm configuration in this scenario? This work also leaves open the potential for data-dependent bounds over well-behaved distributions, such as those over clustering instances satisfying some form of stability, be it approximation stability, perturbation resilience, or so on.  Acknowledgments. This work was supported in part by grants NSF-CCF 1535967, NSF CCF- 1422910, NSF IIS-1618714, a Sloan Fellowship, a Microsoft Research Fellowship, a NSF Graduate Research Fellowship, a Microsoft Research Women’s Fellowship, and a National Defense Science and Engineering Graduate (NDSEG) fellowship.
